pmath::String

pmath::String Class Reference
[C++ Binding]

A wrapper for pmath_string_t.

This class provides some string utility functions in addition to Expr. More...

Inherits pmath::Expr.

Detailed Description

A wrapper for pmath_string_t.

This class provides some string utility functions in addition to Expr.
